content: History in image; doesn't matter which side you are on this day remarks one of the worst days of humanity in modern history. Press conferance of a doctor in Gaza after hospital bombing. (verified image from Turkish Ministry of Health)

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Quote from: tetaeridanus on October 18, 2023, 09:45:06 PMPress conferance of a doctor in Gaza after hospital bombing. (verified image from Turkish Ministry of Health)Could we please stop spreading unproven propaganda? First, there is valid proof that the incident wasn't an israeli rocket fired on that hospital but instead a misfired rocket from a group close to Hamas, called Islamic Jihad. See my post here. Second, there is valid proof that the Al Ahli Hospital didn't even got destroyed a tiny bit, just a parking lot nearby: Destroyed parking lot in the front, intact hospital in the background                                          view from the front

There is civilian deaths here, have some morals behind that keyboard.Secondly, do you even know what 'Sahra Hospital' means? You don't, because you are in your comfy bed watching tv in your European Country where I and many others live in the Middle East; you don't even know how Middle East is right now. This hospital refuged people who ran away from war to be secure; it opened it's gardens to children and women to play and sleep. This is a usual procedure you Westerners don't know that is happening in every bombed Middle Eastern Nation. Children and women sleep on the floor of hospitals to avoid missiles. There is even a video of children playing in the very same day of the night the attack occurred.You bluntly trying to even prove this attack didn't happen in this first place is inhumane and really disturbing.Lastly; I didn't even said Israel or Hamas did this; you are attacking to me and defensing Israel is out of topic.So, you claim this photos are from Los Angeles California, in a film stage; staged against Israel? I'm not joking; your logic is a lot ironic than this sentence.EuroNews:Edit:This is what 'Field Hospital' looks like; you can see the dead bodies inside that in my previous photo; please don't attack on people with false propoganda yourself before claiming I am doing one.

comments.body: First of all I see that you have a slight 'Islamophobia' in the thread you have linked. Don't blame the religion, blame the worshippers. Not every Muslim is a terrorist and not one of those civilian babies kids women and men are terrorists; they deserve to live in the land they are born. They deserve to have a social life, education, marry and create a family themselves and get old. They are all dead. I don't value Israeli life more than any other life unlike you. However I am sad that on this age of social media, you still believe the western media crap that is brainwashing you everyday. I am not surprised on Germany's or Germans' side in this; you owe Jews huge apology that will last for centuries, I don't even believe you can be against them if they killed Germans in Israel. Anyways off topic;I see you didn't even search what a field hospital is, that is everywhere in Gaza because of people fearing their and their families' lives; they refuge in field hospitals to get treatment for babies, food for kids, health for their elderlies. These are usually formed around hospital buildings to get aid quickly and according to international war laws; hospitals are off-limits. Well, was since yesterday. I condemn everyone who has a part in this, including the people who play the three monkey against all this babies dying and calling it propoganda. Shame on you! You are in delusion about this hospital and the accident; go open a tv, watch news; have some moral!My Los Angeles example was to show how your comments are seen by other people in this forum who have a slight bit of a moral and straight mind. I also thank you for your wishes of the conflict to be settled peacefully, I am a Turkish person, however I can feel the pain of other countries' kids dying murderously. It seems like you don't since you still say Islamic Jihadists or bs. This post was created by me to show people the realness and reality of the war going on. Not pick sides. You turned this topic to shame Hamas; I don't approve Hamas' attack on Israel; and I also am sad about the lost civilian lives in Israel; unlike you. You have zero proof and even satirical claims that have no back up; and calling real proof with images, a propoganda.Get a grip of reality. The blood of those kids are in the hands of people who stay silent to this Genocide.Have a nice day as well sir'

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: 1miau on October 19, 2023, 12:35:48 PMWell, what happened a week ago, when Hamas fighters went to Israeli cities? They killed innocent civilians and caused the whole recent upheaval. Maybe you should first familiarize yourself with the regions you want to give opinion about then start speculating about what might have happened. Or maybe you are just repeating some random stuff you read on the internet!The Palestinians didn't kill any "innocent civilians".For starters there may be some innocent civilians in the capital of the occupied Palestine on in occupied cities like Quds, etc. But the people you see in the settlements around Gaza and West bank are armed militia strategically placed there as a proxy between Palestinians and the occupiers in the rest of the occupied land. They are handpicked men and women armed to the teeth who are categorized as extremists and regularly shoot Palestinians for fun.These militia are part and parcel of the Israeli expansion program where they silently murder the actual innocent civilians and keep pushing forward, decreasing the size of Palestine and increasing the size of the fake "country" they built on their graves.On October 7 the Palestinian resistance started sweeping the military bases around Gaza in the settlements and in the clash between the resistance and Israeli military and militia there was exchange of fire and it had casualties, mostly on the the Israeli side both because they have the weakest ground forces in the world and also they were caught off guard. BTW in Israel women are also part of the military.Of course it is easy to make the mistake when you see a picture like this where an "unarmed innocent-looking" man barefoot and wearing underpants is being dragged by the neck by 2 angry armed Palestinians.What they don't tell you is that people like this are military personnel not "innocent civilians". For example this one is the biggest terrorist there is. He is Major General Nimrod Aloni; who I believe is the commander of Israeli Defense Forces called "Depth Corps" that is designated to keep an eye on Palestinians inside Gaza and eliminate any of them that may think about joining the Resistance.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: To be honest with you all, I think the internet has reached a state where I may not ever be 100% of what I am seeing or reading is true again. Someone can post or share pictures of the victims of the Hamas attack or share pictures of the innocent civilians getting caught in the crossfire between both factions and yet, before judging what it is in front on my eyes, I need to consider the possibility of it being completely fabricated information and images.It was way easier in the old times, wasn't it? One just needed to turn on the Television and watch the News. Not anymore, now everyone sharing information both on internet and on TV is biased...

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: 1miau on October 19, 2023, 06:51:30 PM~You still insist on giving opinion about a place that you can't even point to on the maps let alone having an understanding of the region or the people in it. All because you read some propaganda on the internet and believed it!Take all the pictures you posted. All of them are either the aftermath (showing abandoned vehicles on the side of the road) or some people just running for reasons that are not shown in the videos and yet you call it "Hamas killing civilians". Why don't you post a single frame of the actual shootout? It is simple, that's because it would negate the propaganda!Here is an example. The black arrow shows a Palestinian fighter and the red arrow shows an Israeli woman who is taking shelter beside him from the Israeli terrorists bullets that are flying in her direction. The source is clear on the top right side of the picture and you can find loads more there and all over the internet:Of course the Israeli terrorist sympathizer have spread so many lies that it is hard to keep up. Trying to debunk every bullshit is not only exhausting but also pointless because the terrorists keep murdering children in Gaza while everyone is busy debunking their lies that is being spread by the brainwashed masses. By the time you debunk one, they've already spread two dozen more and by the time you debunk those they've drowned you in lies.Here's another in case you haven't heard or decided to forget:At the end of the day "keyboard warriors" aren't changing anything, so I'll probably stop trying to debunk obvious lies as the information is already out there for anybody who bothers looking. As I said elsewhere, bullets is the only language terrorists and their supporters understand. For example the two cruise missiles that USS Carney received last night in the middle of Red Sea was a better message than all the propaganda debunking on the internet combined... That's the only remaining way the Genocide can stop.
